title.native: アンデッドガール・マーダーファルス

description:
The 19th century — a world inhabited by vampires, golems, werewolves and other paranormal creatures. Immortal beauty and disembodied head Aya Rindo, along with half-human-half-demon "Demon Killer" Tsugaru Shunichi and her loyal maid Shizuku Hasei, travels through Europe as supernatural detective "The Cage User," solving supernatural mysteries while she searches for her lost body.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

node.description: Shinichi Omata is a Japanese director, storyboard artist, and former producer best known for directing Showa Genroku Rakugo Shinju (2016) and Kaguya-sama: Love is War (2019).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/782100914744152065)

_Note: Not to be confused with the [other animator](https://anilist.co/staff/234079/)._

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E8%8B%A5%E6%9E%97%E5%92%8C%E5%BC%98)

**Kazuhiro Wakabayashi** is a Japanese sound director who was formerly affiliated with Techno Sound and Omnibus Promotion. After going freelance, he established his own sound production studio on May 7, 2004 called Fonishia. In 2013, he went freelance once again after his sound production studio disbanded.

Japanese guitarist. He has been the guitarist for the band [Plastic Tree](https://anilist.co/staff/105538) since 1994.

[Website (JP)](https://classy-official.jp/) | [Profile (M25)](https://m25ent.com/21) | [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@m25_classy) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/@OFFICIAL_CLASSy) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/m25_classy/) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/@M25.CLASSy/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/M25_CLASSy)

A South Korean girl group formed through the MBC reality competition show *My Teenage Girl* and co-managed by M25, a subsidiary of PocketDol Studio, and Universal Music Japan.

__Current Members:__
- Myung Hyung-Seo (명형서)
- Yoon Chae-Won (윤채원)
- Hong Hye-Ju (홍혜주)
- Kim Ri-Won (김리원)
- Won Ji-Min (원지민)
- Park Bo-Eun (박보은)
- Kim Seon-You (김선유)
**Mori Akitoshi (森彬俊)** is a Japanese producer affiliated with Fuji TV.

__Eiko Morikawa__ is a Japanese sound effects editor. She started working at Swara Production, then went to Rakuonsha, and now is the representative director of Chura Sound.

(Source: AniDB)
